docs.snippet: Just because someone who commits a terrible crime has a “mental problem” does not mean it is a treatable psychiatric illness....

docs.snippet: Carey Gabay, who was critically injured in the attack just hours before the start of the parade on Monday, was “not doing well,” Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carey Gabay, who was critically injured in the attack just hours before the start of the parade on Monday, was “not doing well,” Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said.
docs.abstract: Carey Gabay, lawyer for administration of New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, is caught in crossfire of shootout that police suspect to be gang-related during celebrations leading up to annual West Indian American Day parade; remains in critical condition at Kings County Hospital Center.

headline.main: Cuomo Administration Lawyer Is Shot in Head Before West Indian Day Parade
headline.print_headline: State Lawyer Shot in Head Before Parade in Brooklyn

byline.contributor: Joshua Jamerson, Nate Schweber and Nikita Stewart contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump has given voice to conservative activists’ unease with America’s changing demography, prompting rivals to follow suit and worrying party leaders....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump has given voice to conservative activists’ unease with America’s changing demography, prompting rivals to follow suit and worrying party leaders.
docs.abstract: Republicans are becoming more concerned that Donald J Trump's controversial and pugnacious comments are hurting party; worry that his remarks are causing other candidates to harden tone on racial issues, alienating crucial voters.

headline.main: Republicans Fear Donald Trump Is Hardening Party’s Tone on Race
headline.print_headline: Republicans Fear That Trump and Rivals Are Hardening Party’s Tone on Race
